rules.name: Leader-Beasts
rules.lore: Tyranid Warriors are adapted to shepherd the hive fleet’s teeming swarms to war. Benefiting from heightened senses, hardened forms and great strength, they serve as ferocious beacons for and enforcers of the Hive Mind’s indomitable will.
rules.text: +Warrior+ and +Prime+ units in your army have an Invulnerable Save trait of 5+.

rules.name: Keywords
rules.text:
The following units gain the +Warrior+ and +Battleline+ keywords and, while not Battle-Shocked, have an Objective Control trait of 3+:

* Tyranid Warriors with Ranged Bio-Weapons
* Tyranid Warriors with Melee Bio-Weapons

spells.name: Catalyst
spells.effect: Select a friendly +Tyranids+ unit within Synapse Range. Until the end of the Battle Round, the selected unit has !Feel No Pain 5+!. If the selected unit is +Titanic+, until the end of the Battle Round, it has !Feel No Pain 6+! instead.

spells.name: Horror
spells.effect: Select an enemy unit within 24". Until the end of the Battle Round, it has -3 to Battle-Shock tests and -2 to all other Leadership rolls.

spells.name: Onslaught
spells.effect: Select a friendly +Tyranids+ unit within Synapse Range. Until the end of the Battle Round: It does not incur a penalty for Advancing and Shooting with +[Assault]+ weapons, its +[Heavy]+ weapons have +1 to hit rolls (but do not gain any additional bonus from remaining stationary), and it may Advance and Charge in the same Activation.

strategems.name: Rapid Regeneration
strategems.when: Just after an enemy unit has selected Shoot or Fight targets.
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, the selected unit has !Feel No Pain 6+!. While the selected unit is within Synapse Range, it has !Feel No Pain 5+! instead.

strategems.name: Synaptic Insight
strategems.when: At the start of a Battle Round
strategems.target: One friendly +Tyranids+ unit, or two friendly +Tyranids+ units within Synapse Range
strategems.effect: Select a Hyper-Adaptation different to the one chosen at the start of the battle. Selected units gain that Hyper-Adaptation effect, in addition to any other Hyper-Adaptation effect already active.
strategems.restriction: A unit may not be given a particular Hyper-Adaptation more than once.

strategems.name: Endless Swarm
strategems.when: At the start of a Battle Round
strategems.target: One friendly +Endless Multitude+ unit, or two friendly +Endless Multitude+ units within Synapse Range.
strategems.effect: Return up to d3 + 3 destroyed models to each selected unit.
